name: Nariyal ki Mithai Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Nariyal ki Mithai Recipe: Coconut powder 250gm Sugar 200gm Coconut crushed 100gm Milk powder 250gm Raisin 50gm Almonds chopped 50gm Water 1cup
instructions: Cook sugar and water till it becomes thick mixture Now add coconut powder & milk powder Then add almonds and raisin Now sprinkle chopped coconut & cut like cubes and serve chilled
